title: The most ambitious Mexican-themed retail development project is Plaza Mexico, which opened in 2003 on East Imperial Highway in the City of Inglewood (in Los Angeles County). When fully developed, the thirty-six-acre site will have more than 450,000 square feet of retail, food, and office space, complete with plazas, kioskos, fountains, carretas, and statues of Benito Juárez and La Virgen de Guadalupe.
